ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT Instruments (was complete heal)
ygData.msgSnippet: Bard Oktoberfest! Our bardic quest would be lederhosen with matching hat and then all do a drunken chicken dance. Oooompah Oooompah Ooompah pah Or is that just
ygData.messageBody:
Bard Oktoberfest!

Our bardic quest would be lederhosen with matching hat and then all do a
drunken chicken dance.

Oooompah Oooompah Ooompah pah

Or is that just a little too silly? Hrm

---Windleaf

>Heh...I'd work on my brewing again, if I could play Beer Barrel Polka on the
>accordian at the wiz spires in Gfay during primetime. :)
>
>Rooollll ouuuut the barrel! :)
>
